roleset.name: experiencing nervousness

role.descr: cause of anxiety -- anxious over/about what?

example.name: All args
example.text: Besides coping with the divorce, she was anxious over family crises including her mother's diagnosis with a serious lung disease.
example.arg: over family crises including her mother's diagnosis with a serious lung disease.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01.

roleset.name: antsy, impatient, eager to do something

example.name: both args
example.text: She was anxious to finish school and get a job.
example.arg: to finish school and get a job

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet.
